titles.title: A resolution appointing a committee to notify the President concerning the proposed adjournment of the session.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/21/1988--Introduced. Appoints a committee of two Senators to join a similar committee of the House of Representatives to notify the President that the Congress has completed its business of the session and is ready to adjourn.
